ADA_COMBATBANNER.Settings.announceTurn.H: Create a chat message for each combatant's turn.
Create a chat message at the start of each round.
ADA_COMBATBANNER.Settings.colors.default: Used in Default color mode for all banners, and in Disposition Color mode for the New Round banner.
ADA_COMBATBANNER.Settings.forceDefaultCo: Use the default color instead of the User's set color.
ADA_COMBATBANNER.Settings.colorRules.Hin: 'User Colors' will pull from the foundry user's associated color for any tookens owned by that user, including the GM. 'Default Color Only' will use the default color in the settings for all banners. 'Disposition Colors' will use the colors found in the setting here for friendly, hostile, and neutral actors.
ADA_COMBATBANNER.Settings.colors.friendl: Turn banner color for friendly characters in 'Disposition Colors' mode.
ADA_COMBATBANNER.Settings.colors.neutral: Turn banner color for neutral characters in 'Disposition Colors' mode.
ADA_COMBATBANNER.Settings.colors.hostile: Turn banner color for hostile characters in 'Disposition Colors' mode.
